info.name: Retro Diaspora with fixed publisher
info.description:
Un thème Diaspora* légèrement rétro avec le "publisher" fixe.
A vintage Diaspora's theme with fixed publisher.
info.additionalInfo:
Police / font : Boogaloo ( https://www.google.com/fonts/#QuickUsePlace:quickUse/Family:Boogaloo )
If you use this style with another pod, tell me to updgrade my code.

Sept 2, 2013 : Buggs fixed.
Sept 1, 2013 : New release of Diaspora*, so update.
28 - 07 - 13 : Several bugs fixed.
19 - 06 - 13 : many bugs fixed. Design changes.
06 - 04 - 13 : fix some bugs and some changes (comments, up button, post views)
06 - 04 - 13 (few minutes later --') : fix some bugs with private conversations
07 - 04 - 13 : another bugs fixed (troubles with color / visibility)
07 - 04 - 13 (again) : fix some bugs for chrome / chrominium
13 - 05 - 13 : Many pods added.
